<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Mage for Hire](/NPCs.aspx?ID=922)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Not all mercenaries sell brawn and intimidating glares. Some sell their magical talents to earn a living. While there are many types of mages for hire, some of the sneakiest are specialized in [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), using their skills for infiltration and sabotage.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>
